title: Chat restriction
body:
10 game restriction for this. Champion select started off with adc locking in cho thinking hes jungle. trades to the acutal jungle for cait. neither of them had ever played said champions. Panthion proceeds to troll/feed/refuse to help all game long until the last fight.  

Panth then blames the cait and cho for the loss while he feeds his brains out calling them trolls. the game is in my history feel free to check it out


Game 1
Pre-Game
Envy Sin: ?
Envy Sin: uhh
Envy Sin: i can work with you
Envy Sin: no worries
Envy Sin: you play aggro?
Envy Sin: or safe
Envy Sin: Or not
Envy Sin: P:
Envy Sin: alright then
Envy Sin: you have smite
Envy Sin: zzzzzzzzz
In-Game
Envy Sin: you
Envy Sin: have
Envy Sin: smite
Envy Sin: welp cho hope its cool if we take camps now and then
Envy Sin: and between cho feast and double smite
Envy Sin: if we dont get drakes
Envy Sin: we deseve the loss
Envy Sin: ffs........
Envy Sin: woulda been better
Envy Sin: to have cho bot lane
Envy Sin: then this shit
Envy Sin: someone afk so we can remake
Envy Sin: for the love of god
Envy Sin: ekko 600 ping
Envy Sin: first time jungle cho
Envy Sin: and adc that doesnt adc
Envy Sin: epic
Envy Sin: saying Epic is toxic apprant;ly
Envy Sin: because they get a free win who cares
Envy Sin: negative yep
Envy Sin: not sure how im toxic
Envy Sin: prob negative because of this shitshow of champion select
Envy Sin: might have something to do witth it
Envy Sin: hard shove vayne dead
Envy Sin: yay and kin camping bot
Envy Sin: lol and im toxic?
Envy Sin: you calling us garbage is pretty toxic
Envy Sin: ganked 3 times now
Envy Sin: we cant b again
Envy Sin: or lose tower
Envy Sin: LOL
Envy Sin: fat finger               (fat fingered my F key and flashed in 1v3)
Envy Sin: see panth camping
Envy Sin: all game kin bot side
Envy Sin: i main morg
Envy Sin: have since season 2
Envy Sin: asking for reports is reportable
Envy Sin: this panth though
Envy Sin: For?
Envy Sin: lawl
Envy Sin: tosic for?
Envy Sin: how?
Envy Sin: you gave up and are greifing
Envy Sin: which is reportable
Envy Sin: enjoy panth
Envy Sin: you have
Envy Sin: you are giving up
Envy Sin: refusing to help
Envy Sin: feeds 1/7 lol
Envy Sin: blames 3/3 cho
Envy Sin: funny
Envy Sin: first time cho better than you
Envy Sin: lol
Envy Sin: lets mid tower fall
Envy Sin: and acutally panth
Envy Sin: cait picked cho
Envy Sin: not cho
Envy Sin: they traded
Envy Sin: must not have eyes
Envy Sin: shes alone
Envy Sin: ekko you can use aa to run too like that when minons are ahead
Envy Sin: after you dash
Envy Sin: waste more time
Envy Sin: panth still wont group
Envy Sin: cho your feast does more then amite
Envy Sin: panth if you acutally helped
Envy Sin: we could prob win
Envy Sin: ^
Envy Sin: but you dont wanna win
Envy Sin: see
Envy Sin: but then try to 1v5 lol
Post-Game
Envy Sin: Panth the real troll was you
Envy Sin: and you know it
Envy Sin: Enjoy the reports
Envy Sin: because we are 4 man reporting you
Envy Sin: i did cait did cho did
Envy Sin: ekko did
Envy Sin: Enjoy

replies.body:
I know you apparently want 'exact lines' that are toxic, but that's just not how it works.

If I had to do that, I would have to copy paste almost the entire chat.

You were constantly spreading negativity and whining about your team. Constantly blaming others.

Examples would be when you complain that someone isn't helping, or saying 'Enjoy the reports'.

That's just examples though, as almost the entire chatlog is filled to the brim with negative comments.

---

All in all, I'd say that this is a great example of what is worthy of a chat-restriction. You're being overly annoying and whining the entire game.

> [{quoted}](name=RallerenP,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1o3acY8U,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-02-02T10:06:56.567+0000)
>
> I know you apparently want 'exact lines' that are toxic, but that's just not how it works.
> 
> If I had to do that, I would have to copy paste almost the entire chat.
> 
> You were constantly spreading negativity and whining about your team. Constantly blaming others.
> 
> Examples would be when you complain that someone isn't helping, or saying 'Enjoy the reports'.
> 
> That's just examples though, as almost the entire chatlog is filled to the brim with negative comments.
> 
> ---
> 
> All in all, I'd say that this is a great example of what is worthy of a chat-restriction. You're being overly annoying and whining the entire game.

you should see what panth was saying if you think i was being negative

as for "constant whining" 
Envy Sin: lets mid tower fall
Envy Sin: and acutally panth
Envy Sin: cait picked cho
Envy Sin: not cho
Envy Sin: they traded
Envy Sin: must not have eyes

speaking the truth

Envy Sin: shes alone
Envy Sin: ekko you can use aa to run too like that when minons are ahead
Envy Sin: after you dash
Envy Sin: waste more time

infoming my team vayne was alone and telling ekko he can waste more of kass's time as they chase him down the lane

Envy Sin: we cant b again
Envy Sin: or lose tower
Envy Sin: LOL
Envy Sin: fat finger (fat fingered my F key and flashed in 1v3)

our tower was at 10%
i laughed at myself for fat fingering flash

Envy Sin: hard shove vayne dead

shotcalling

Envy Sin: cho your feast does more then amite

informing our first time cho how his R works

Envy Sin: panth if you acutally helped
Envy Sin: we could prob win

Trying to get panth to do something for the team instead of permafarming top while they 5 man push mid

Envy Sin: you are giving up
Envy Sin: refusing to help
Envy Sin: feeds 1/7 lol
Envy Sin: blames 3/3 cho

panth was verbaly attacking our cho and i defended him 

Most of my chat wasnt negative

> Most of my chat wasnt negative

I guess that's where we disagree.

At this point, nothing I say can convince you that you were being negative. But seeing the responses to the thread, and the fact that you got the punishment must surely mean that you can atleast admit that others also found you negative, right?

> [{quoted}](name=RallerenP,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1o3acY8U,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-02-02T18:55:16.401+0000)
>
> I guess that's where we disagree.
> 
> At this point, nothing I say can convince you that you were being negative. But seeing the responses to the thread, and the fact that you got the punishment must surely mean that you can atleast admit that others also found you negative, right?

Yeah the trolling raging path did.
Making a bad situation even worse while also running your mouth and flaming is punishable.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1o3acY8U,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-02T05:16:46.432+0000)
>
> Making a bad situation even worse while also running your mouth and flaming is punishable.

Which lines exactly
So..... what are you confused about?

Negative chat of all kinds is punishable. Even if your actions don't match the chat.

> Envy Sin: someone afk so we can remake

Riot support will look at that and say you were "giving up", "defeatist attitude", etc.

> [{quoted}](name=Awf Meta,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1o3acY8U,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-02T05:50:26.972+0000)
>
> Negative chat of all kinds is punishable. Even if your actions don't match the chat.
> 
> Riot support will look at that and say you were "giving up", "defeatist attitude", etc.


Envy Sin: ekko 600 ping
Envy Sin: first time jungle cho
Envy Sin: and adc that doesnt adc

sure hope that panth got the same punishment then
edit: because at least i tried to win

> [{quoted}](name=Envy Sin,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1o3acY8U,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-02-02T06:52:06.189+0000)
>
> edit: because at least i tried to win

Riot doesn't care about win or lose. Riot wants chat to be 100% no negativity. Other players are using poor game play to bait you into saying negative things.

Funny how the minor amount of negativity is such a huge issue. while the panth calling us garbage. shit. trash. trolls. griefers. etc etc etc blaming cho and cait for the loss isnt a issue. if ya'll could see the other side of the chat you might see why i reacted this way. gotta love the context. meanwhile my whole team reacted as bad IF NOT WORSE to the way panth was acting and talking

but hey i guess i could report every single person in every single game i've played for being "negative" Since this is pretty common
